item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 2, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Fish have a brain microbiome – could humans have one too? (77 points | 37 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (80 points | 79 comments)
3. Bioluminescent wood using the white rot fungus desarmillaria tabescens (18 points | 3 comments)

7. Intel announces retirement of Pat Gelsinger (642 points | 467 comments)

11. Kenya and "the decline of the greatest coffee" (2021) (128 points | 73 comments)
12. Claud Cockburn invented guerrilla journalism (14 points | 2 comments)
13. Unlocking the power of time-series data with multimodal models (6 points | 1 comment)
14. KlongPy: High-Performance Array Programming in Python (82 points | 45 comments)

16. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (December 2024) (25 points | 68 comments)

23. Show HN: SQL Simulator – Create Subsetted Databases in Docker or K8s (11 points | 2 comments)
24. What will enter the public domain in 2025? (355 points | 281 comments)
25. Smaller Satellite Images (25 points | 3 comments)
26. What happens if we remove 50 percent of Llama? (173 points | 102 comments)
27. OrioleDB beta7: Benchmarks (96 points | 10 comments)
28. Restaurant Menu Tricks (2020) (76 points | 48 comments)
29. Ask HN: How can I grow as an engineer without good seniors to learn from? (443 points | 272 comments)
30. Show HN: Visualizing website carbon footprints using steam and robotics [video] (32 points | 6 comments)
